name: queryFilter
description: Filters query rows specified in filter criteria

examples.title: Filter a query
examples.code:
<cfscript>
    news = queryNew("id,type,title", "integer,varchar,varchar");
    queryAddRow(news,[{
        id: 1,
        type: "book",
        title: "Cloud Atlas"
    },{
        id: 2,
        type: "book",
        title: "Lord of The Rings"
    },{
        id: 3,
        type: "film",
        title: "Men in Black"
    }]);
    books = QueryFilter(news,function(_news) {
        return _news.type is 'book';
    });
    writeDump(ValueList(books.title,', '));
</cfscript>
examples.result: Cloud Atlas, Lord of The Rings

examples.title: Filter a query as member function
examples.code:
<cfscript>
    news = queryNew("id,type,title", "integer,varchar,varchar");
    queryAddRow(news,[{
        id: 1,
        type: "book",
        title: "Cloud Atlas"
    },{
        id: 2,
        type: "book",
        title: "Lord of The Rings"
    },{
        id: 3,
        type: "film",
        title: "Men in Black"
    }]);
    books = news.filter(function(_news) {
        return _news.type is 'book';
    });
    writeDump(ValueList(books.title,', '));
</cfscript>
examples.result: Cloud Atlas, Lord of The Rings
